snippet: The Supreme Court has been asked to consider the free speech implications of an ordinance that limits panhandling in Worcester, Mass.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column observes that Supreme Court will weigh whether to hear appeal of Worcester, Mass, ordinance limiting begging by establishing 20-foot buffer zones, measure with free speech implications.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has been asked to consider the free speech implications of an ordinance that limits panhandling in Worcester, Mass.

headline.main: Begging Law Tests Ruling on Buffer Zones
headline.print_headline: Begging Law Tests Ruling on Buffer Zones
